definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: All of above can let people better understand the process of aesthetic activities.
sentences.chinese: 以上這些，都可以讓人們更好地理解審美活動的過程。

sentences.english: Aesthetic activity is the unique mental practice of human being.
sentences.chinese: 審美活動是人類的一種獨特的精神實踐活動。

sentences.english: Actually, reading literary texts is a kind of aesthetic activity to middle school students.
sentences.chinese: 中學生對文學作品的閱讀實際上也是一種審美活動。

sentences.english: The reportage is a kind of aesthetic activity.
sentences.chinese: 報告文學的活動是一種審美活動。
